TopicTitle: Fanwork Friday: Jebediah is Breaking Physics

Articles.Content: We love this reference by deviantartist dok377. What could you do with Bromine and Phosphorous though? Whatever it is, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s probably a blast! **Edited July 31, 2015 by KasperVld**
You can see his work in the background! What a lovely mess!

> 
> What could you do with Bromine and Phosphorous though? Whatever it is, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s probably a blast!

"Blast" is the right term for it, assuming it's white phosphorus.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-31T22:32:42Z" title="07/31/2015 10:32  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 31, 2015</time> by Alshain**

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Wf9-G9VjM8g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Seems like the reaction is exothermic enough for the thing to start burning (though using the oxygen from the air as an oxidant it would seem from the vid ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

Still - don't try it at home ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
